QuestData.Title: Crabby Patrons
QuestData.Description: These crabs are not friendly. Not. Friendly.$B$BSam's endless drilling is riling them up. I know from experience that there's no stopping Sam, so let's look into the other side of things, shall we?
QuestData.RewardText: Does everything down here only come in jumbo size? Oooh! That's a thought. Maybe there are some hunky sea goblins around here somewhere.$B$BThanks, by the way.
